name: PatientActivation
title: Patient Activation
description: Measure of the person's level of knowledge, skill, and confidence for managing their health and healthcare on a validated scale, e.g., PAM (Business ID: Entry 2729865)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Patient Activation.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an measure of the person's level of knowledge, skill, and confidence for managing their health and healthcare on a validated scale, e.g., pam.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Patient Activation.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Patient Activation.)
